subject: [cc-community] exclusive rights?
body:
Hi everybody,

Just a quick question:

Which of the USA music rights collection societies is using exclusive 
rights and which one isn't? I thought ASCAP is collecting without the 
need for exclusive rights from the artist?

If you know the answer, I would also be very happy if you could point me 
to some creditable sources.

Thanks!

All the best,

grtz
BjornW
